io.spine.tools.mc.js.fs

Class FileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.mc.js.fs.FileWriter

  • public final class FileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    A writer of JavaScript code into a file.

    The class wraps all IOExceptions which occur during its operations in the IllegalStateException.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Appends the given output to the end of the file.

      Creates a new writer for the file with the specified location and the name.
      static FileWriter newInstance(io.spine.tools.js.fs.Directory directory, io.spine.tools.js.fs.LibraryFile libraryFile)
      Creates a new instance which will operate on the specified library file located in the specified directory.

      Writes the given output to the file.

      • write

        public void write(CodeWriter jsOutput)
        Writes the given output to the file.

        Overwrites the previous file content.

        Parameters:
        jsOutput - the JavaScript code to write to the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if something went wrong when writing to file

        Appends the given output to the end of the file.
        Parameters:
        jsOutput - the JsOutput to append
        Throws:
